nodes.text: Heavy Proton Torpedo Launchers were crawler-type anti-starfighter artillery vehicles used by the Wookiees on the planet Kashyyyk. The vehicles saw action during the Liberation of Kashyyyk in 4 ABY. Two units were deployed during the Liberation of Kessel shortly afterward. They were constructed in heavy weapons factories using carbon units and nova crystals. The combat vehicles were armed with three artillery armaments loaded with proton torpedoes.
Heavy Proton Torpedo Launchers appear in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds. The campaign was later included in its 2002 expansion pack.
